details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 5 Version identification - PDF/UA Identification Schema
details.description: The PDF/UA version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/UA Identification extension schema.

rule.description: The PDF/UA version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/UA Identification extension schema.

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contains PDF/UA Identification Schema.
